Requirement You are under the effect of a meditation spell.

You perform the following as you Sustain your Meditation.

Make a Perception check against the target’s @Check[perception|against:deception|options:action:sense-motive] Deception or @Check[perception|against:stealth|options:action:sense-motive] Stealth DC, whichever is higher. This counts as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive} check for any benefits you may have to taking Sense Motive actions. On a success, you glean a sense of the target’s movements and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your AC and saving throw against their next attack or spell for 1 round (+2 on critical success).

@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.classes.8Klm9H6BXxA7OMUJ]{Effect: Moonglare}
